Question
========

The following cross tabulation includes data from 150 individuals for two variables A and B.

  ------- ------- ------- ------- A = 1 A = 2 A = 3 B = 1 19 50 13 B = 2 18 32 18 ------- ------- ------- -------

We randomly draw someone from among the 150 people. For this person, P(A
= 1|A = 2) is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0
* 0.56
* 0.38
* 0.79

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0: Correct
* 0.56: Incorrect
* 0.38: Incorrect
* 0.79: Incorrect
